body.p: This tool doesn't intent to rival EJB or OSGI, it brings only modularity to servlet based applications while others brings many more.
However if offers local call with classloading sharing that EJB spec lacks, and is less coercing then OSGI.

Not every developper have the chance to work on new applications using latest technology and those doing maintenance on simple web applications will appreciate having this instrument in their toolbelt.
Futhermore it is a great satisfaction to accomplish what many others judged impossible !
